app.title: Cachy
app.backupButtonTitle: Create a backup of all settings and data
app.restoreButtonTitle: Restore data from a backup file
app.restoreConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? All current settings, presets, and journal entries will be irreversibly overwritten. This action cannot be undone.
app.backupEncryptQuestion: Do you want to encrypt this backup with a password?
app.backupPasswordRequired: A password is required for encryption.
app.backupPasswordEntryPrompt: This backup is encrypted. Please enter the password:
app.enterBackupPassword: Please enter the password for this backup:

legal.disclaimerBody:
No Financial Advice: This application ('Cachy') is a software tool provided for educational, informational, and simulation purposes only. The calculations, results, and signals generated by this application are hypothetical and do not constitute financial, investment, legal, or tax advice.

Use at Own Risk: Trading cryptocurrencies and derivatives involves a high degree of risk and can result in the loss of your entire capital. You are solely responsible for your trading decisions and the configuration of this tool. The developers of Cachy assume no liability for any financial losses or damages resulting from the use of this application, including but not limited to software errors, data inaccuracies, or connectivity issues.

By clicking 'I understand and accept', you acknowledge that you have read this disclaimer and agree to use this application at your own risk.

dashboard.configureApiKeys: Please configure API keys in settings.
dashboard.totalTradeMetricsTooltip: Overview of key metrics for the entire trade.
dashboard.riskPerTradeCurrencyTooltip: The absolute monetary amount you risk max.
dashboard.totalFeesTooltip: Estimated total costs for this trade.
dashboard.maxPotentialProfitTooltip: Maximum net profit if the entire position is closed at the best TP.
dashboard.weightedRRTooltip: Average risk/reward ratio of all partial sales.
dashboard.totalNetProfitTooltip: Cumulative net profit from all partial sales.
dashboard.netProfitTooltip: Estimated profit for this partial sale.
dashboard.partialVolumeTooltip: Amount of units for this partial sale.

takeProfitTargets.tooltip: Here you see calculated metrics for each partial take-profit target.

summaryResults.maxNetLossTooltip: Maximum amount you can lose on this trade, including fees.
summaryResults.requiredMarginTooltip: Capital blocked from your account for this trade.
summaryResults.estimatedLiquidationPriceTooltip: Estimated price where your position will be liquidated.
summaryResults.breakEvenPriceTooltip: Price where your trade breaks even considering fees.

dashboard.promptForData: Please enter required trade data to start calculation.

journal.title: Trade Journal
journal.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this trade?
journal.confirmRecalculateAtr: Do you want to recalculate all ATR values in the journal? This may take a moment if you have many trades.
journal.csvTooManyLines: Too many lines ({count} trades). Maximum: {max} trades per import. Please split the CSV file.
journal.csvEmpty: CSV is empty or has only a header.
journal.csvMissingColumns: CSV file missing required columns (or unknown language): {columns}

descriptions.leakageWaterfall: PnL Waterfall: Analysis of gross result minus fees and slippage.
descriptions.leakageTags: Strategies or tags causing the biggest losses.
descriptions.leakageTiming: Times when the biggest losses occur.
descriptions.equityCurve: Total capital progression based on all closed trades.
descriptions.drawdown: Shows the decline from the last equity high.
descriptions.confluenceMatrix: Correlation matrix of day of the week and time of day. Identifies your 'Golden Hours' and loss phases.
descriptions.cumulativeR: Sum of all R-Multiples over time. Shows performance adjusted for position size.
descriptions.longVsShort: Comparison of net profits between Long and Short positions.
descriptions.bottomSymbols: The 5 trading pairs with the largest losses.
descriptions.riskConsistency: Shows how consistent your risk per trade (in % of account) is.
descriptions.grossVsNet: Comparison of profit before (Gross) and after (Net) fees.
descriptions.cumulativeFees: The sum of all fees paid over time.
descriptions.feeBreakdown: Breakdown of costs into Trading Fees and Funding Fees.
descriptions.durationPnl: PnL and Win Rate grouped by trade duration buckets.
descriptions.heatmap: Calendar view of daily PnL performance.
descriptions.forecast: Simulates 100 possible futures based on your historical trades. The cone shows the range between Worst-Case (10th percentile) and Best-Case (90th percentile).
descriptions.rollingWinRate: Your win rate over the last 20 trades. Shows if you are running 'hot' or 'cold'.
descriptions.rollingPF: Your Profit Factor over the last 20 trades. Values above 1.0 are profitable.
descriptions.rollingSQN: System Quality Number (SQN) over 20 trades. > 2.0 is good, > 5.0 is excellent.
descriptions.directionEvolution: Cumulative Profit separated by Long and Short.
descriptions.mfeVsMae: Visualizes exit timing. X-Axis: MAE (Max Pain), Y-Axis: MFE (Max Gain). Top-Left is ideal (Sniper Entry).
descriptions.sixSegment: Detailed breakdown of wins/losses/breakevens separated by Long and Short.
descriptions.riskRadar: Holistic view of your risk profile across 5 dimensions.
descriptions.rMultipleDist: Distribution of trade results in multiples of risk (R).
descriptions.riskRewardScatter: Relationship between risked amount and realized PnL.
descriptions.assetBubble: Bubble size = Trade count. Top right = High Winrate & Profit.
descriptions.dayOfWeekPnl: Gross profits and losses per day of the week.
descriptions.durationVsPnl: Relationship between hold time and profit/loss. Do you recognize patterns in short vs. long trades?
descriptions.hourlyPnl: Gross profits (green) and gross losses (red) per time of day. Helps identify when you are profitable and when you lose money.
descriptions.longShortWinRate: Comparison of win rates between Long and Short trades.
descriptions.recovery: Progression of your drawdowns. Shows how quickly you recover from losses.

seo.title: Cachy - Position Size & Risk Calculator
seo.description: Cachy is a comprehensive trading calculator for position sizing, risk management, and take-profit targets. Optimize your trades with real-time calculations and visual analysis.
seo.keywords: Trading Calculator, Position Sizing, Risk Management, Take Profit, Crypto Trading, Forex Trading, Stock Trading, Trading Tools, Financial Calculator, Trade Optimizer

settings.title: Settings
settings.forceEnglishTechnicalTerms: Technical terms in English (Entry, TP, etc.)
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This cannot be undone.
settings.sidePanelDesc: Collapsible panel on the left edge.
settings.feePreferenceDesc: Select which fee rate to use by default when syncing from API.
settings.securityNote: Keys are stored locally in your browser.

integrations.rssPresetsDesc: Select curated news sources for AI context
integrations.customRssFeedsDesc: Add up to 5 custom RSS feeds (Advanced)
integrations.rssFilterBySymbolDesc: Only show RSS news matching the current chart symbol

ai.providerDesc: Select your primary AI engine for market analysis and automated actions.
ai.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are a professional crypto trading assistant...
ai.geminiModelDesc: Gemini 2.5 Flash offers the best balance. Gemma 3 has high rate limits.
ai.historyDesc: Number of recent trades sent to AI for context
ai.confirmClearHistoryDesc: Requires confirmation before clearing chat history

indicators.title: Indicator Settings
indicators.historyDesc: Maximum number of candles for calculations
indicators.precisionDesc: Number of decimal places for indicator values
indicators.syncRsiDesc: RSI automatically uses the same timeframe as the chart

settings.glassmorphismDesc: Enable glass effect for cards and panels
settings.minChatProfitFactorDesc: Minimum profit factor to display in chat

workspace.indicatorParamsDesc: Shows detailed parameters for each indicator
workspace.positionViewModeDesc: How positions are displayed in the sidebar

settings.missingApiKeys: Please configure your API keys in settings.

profile.presetInfo: You are using a hotkey preset. Switch to 'Custom' to rebind individual hotkeys.

bitunixErrors.30030: SL price must be greater than last price
bitunixErrors.30031: SL price must be greater than mark price
bitunixErrors.30032: TP price must be less than last price

bitunixErrors.30034: TP price must be less than mark price

bitunixErrors.30036: TP price must be greater than trigger price
